grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 悔恨【カイコン】regret, remorse, repentance, contrition
痛悔【ツウカイ】contrition, extreme regret, contrition (in Catholicism)
kun reading compounds: 悔やむ【くやむ】to mourn, to lament, to be sorry, to regret, to repent
悔しい【くやしい】vexing, annoying, frustrating, regrettable, mortifying
